mapper.select: SELECT count(1) AS totleCount, sum(IF(state = 1, 1, 0)) AS openCount, sum(IF(state = 2, 1, 0)) AS privateCount, sum(IF(state = 0, 1, 0)) AS draftCount, sum(IF(state = 3, 1, 0)) AS delCount FROM tbblog WHERE isdel = 0;

SELECT b.id, u.username, b.title, b.typeid, b.top, IFNULL(r.pv,0) AS readCount,b.state, b.htmlContent, b.modifytime FROM tbblog AS b INNER JOIN tbuser AS u ON b.uid = u.id LEFT JOIN tbreads AS r ON b.id = r.bid WHERE isdel=0 AND b.id=#{bid};
